captions.text:
You You You
FLY TO THE SKY

Even if I gave you everything,
it'll never be enough

More precious than my own life,
you you you you

But I have to let you go today and
I'm scared for the first time in my life

I'm such a fool, I guess I believed
we'd be together until we died
After losing you you you you
How am I supposed to live alone?
I don't think I can do anything
Because my love is still too immature,
I can't let you go peacefully
Will you come back to me if I shout and cry like a child?
If I can show you the insides of my heart
My blackened and burnt heart still loves you you you you

If I can hold onto you,
even if it's not manly, I don't care
Because my love is still too immature,
I can't let you go peacefully

Will you come back to me
if I shout and cry like a child?
Even if my heart cries as if it'll break down

I will bite down on this divided love
and let you go now
Who came? Who came?!

It's good to see you after 5 years
How have you been?
I've been doing good
Thank you for taking care of her instead of me
Now everything will go back to what it used to be
If I can show you the insides of my heart
My blackened and burnt heart still loves you you you you

If I can hold onto you,
even if it's not manly, I don't care
Because my love is still too immature,
I can't let you go peacefully

Will you come back to me
if I shout and cry like a child?
Even if my heart cries as if it'll break down

I will bite down on this divided love
and let you go now
Because my love is still too immature,
I can't let you go peacefully

Even though I'm an adult,
my love hasn't grown up
So I can't live a day without you
Because my love is still too immature,
I can't let you go peacefully

Even though I'm an adult,
my love hasn't grown up
So I can't live a day without you
I can't live a day without you

comments.author: 배수지

comments.text:
You guys have to remember the detail that Hwanhee gave up one of his 
kidneys for Brian as you will see that they both have a scar on the 
side(when the girl is lying with Hwanhee, when Brian is changing his 
clothes in the hospital, also when they are fighting note that they both 
grab at their kidneys) that is why Hwanhee is taking the pills (for his 
missing kidney).
 
The girl indeed suffered a head injury which resulted in memory loss at 
which point Hwanhee to an extent took advantage of it (you can see this as 
flashbacks seem to hurt her).

From what I see, it could be that in the beginning he might have tried to 
take care of her but as he did leave her ring with Brian he could've 
developed stronger feelings to an extent that he tried to take her from 
Brian and make her his own. When Brian does wake up the ring is obviously 
the first thing he notices and goes to Hwanhee's house assuming it was 
Hwanhee who took her from him and puts the ring back on her. Hwanhee (from 
his reaction) wasn't expecting Brian to wake up and to an extent actually 
wished he hadn't as Brian would take her back (you can see this from his 
expressions). When they do confront each other Brian passes it off as 
"having taking care of his girl" but shows clear disdain for Hwanhee as he 
says "things will now return to the way that they were" knowing full well 
that Hwanhee loves her and well as you all see she begins regaining her 
memory remembering it was Hwanhee who caused the accident and lashes out at 
him for "loving her" while she was in that state. The showdown happens and 
in the end when Hwanhee gets hit by the car they both realize it was him 
who paid for the surgery and ultimately him who saved and allowed Brian to 
return (as it was Hwanhee who gave up one of his kidneys so Brian could 
live even if there was a probability of Brian not making it through the 
transplant) thats my take on it.﻿
comments.author: Suigojin K

comments.text:
만약 환희가 3집 때 창법 안 바꿨으면 지금까지도 그저 발라드 가수를 표방한 아이돌로밖에 인식되지 못했을 것 같다. 아이돌로 시작했지만 
지금은 아이돌까들 입에서 실력파 가수 대열에 거론될 정도면 말 다한거지.﻿
